BodyName: Subcommittee on COVID Recovery and Resiliency
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration, Committee on Health and the Committee on Hospitals

Items.Title: Oversight - The Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on the Health of Immigrant New Yorkers.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on the Health of Immigrant New Yorkers.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration, Committee on Health and the Committee on Hospitals

Resolution calling on the State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.880A/S.1572A, to provide coverage for health care services under the basic health program for individuals whose immigration status renders them ineligible for federal financial participation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide coverage for health care services under the basic health program for individuals whose immigration status renders them ineligible for federal financial participation. (A.880A/S.1572A)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, the New York for All Act (A.2328-A / S.3076-A), which would prohibit and regulate the discovery and disclosure of immigration status by New York state and local government entities.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: New York for All Act (A.2328 / S.3076)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Schulman, Hanif, Barron, Feliz, Joseph, Hudson, Ung, Velázquez, Yeger, Sanchez, Gutiérrez, Ariola, Krishnan and De La Rosa

Items.Title: Oversight - The Impact of the COVID-19 Pandemic on the Health of Immigrant New Yorkers.
